this capacity that Donald Rumsfeld met with Hussein in 1983- an event that Donald Rumsfeld uses to kick off the book. Donald Rumsfeld archly notes that the encounter, at which he was filmed shaking Saddam's hand, would become the subject of gossip, rumors, and crackpot conspiracy theories for more than a quarter of a century. In Donald Rumsfeld 's telling, the whole business was a fairly straightforward case of great-power politics.
